      public Complaint get(int id) throws NotFoundException
      Description copied from interface: ComplaintRepository
      Get a complaint by id. All the FetchType "LAZY" fields are set to null.
      Specified by:
      get in interface ComplaintRepository
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the complaint
      Returns:
      The Complaint
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If no complaint found with the given id

    • createComplain

      public void createComplain(String description, String createdByUserEmail, String categoryName, String statusName) throws NotFoundException
      Description copied from interface: ComplaintRepository
      Create a new complaint.
      Specified by:
      createComplain in interface ComplaintRepository
      Parameters:
      description - The description of the complaint. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null
      createdByUserEmail - The user email who created the complaint. If it's null, an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown
      categoryName - The name of the category. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null
      statusName - The name of the status. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If the provided user or the category or the status was not found

    • assignExistingEngineer

      public void assignExistingEngineer(String email, int complainId) throws NotFoundException, AlreadyExistException
      Description copied from interface: ComplaintRepository
      Assign an employee to a complaint. Same as EngineerRepositoryImpl.assignExistingComplain(String, int) as Engineer and Complaint are in a bidirectional relation.
      Specified by:
      assignExistingEngineer in interface ComplaintRepository
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null
      complainId - The id of the complaint
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If the employee or the complaint does not exist
      AlreadyExistException - If the employee already has the complaint assigned to them

    • removeAssignedEngineer

      public void removeAssignedEngineer(String email, int complainId) throws NotFoundException
      Description copied from interface: ComplaintRepository
      Remove an employee from a complaint. Same as EngineerRepositoryImpl.removeAssignedComplain(String, int) as Engineer and Complaint are in a bidirectional relation.
      Specified by:
      removeAssignedEngineer in interface ComplaintRepository
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null
      complainId - The id of the complaint.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If the employee or the complaint does not exist, or the employee does not have the complaint previously assigned to them

    • addUpdate

      public void addUpdate(int complaintId, String message) throws NotFoundException
      Description copied from interface: ComplaintRepository
      Add a new Update to a complaint.
      Specified by:
      addUpdate in interface ComplaintRepository
      Parameters:
      complaintId - The id of the complaint
      message - The new message of the update. If it's null, an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If no complaint found with the given id
